trips.title: Rise of the Ottomans Tour
trips.subtitle: 10 Days Turkey Exploration
trips.tagline: Walk in the footsteps of empires.
trips.description: Join us for an unforgettable 10-day journey through Turkey with Ar Rahah. Explore the rich history, culture, and spirituality of this beautiful country, from the bustling streets of Istanbul to the serene landscapes of Cappadocia. Experience the warmth of Turkish hospitality and discover the timeless beauty of Ottoman heritage.
inclusions: Entrance Fees to the indicated Museums & Sites
exclusions: Any meals outside of included meals
Any local transport outside of itinerary i.e. taxis etc.
Hot air Balloon ride in Cappadocia

itinerary.title: Istanbul - Historic Peninsula
itinerary.description: Visit Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, and the Grand Bazaar.

itinerary.title: Istanbul - Bosphorus
itinerary.description: Bosphorus cruise, Dolmabahce Palace, and Taksim Square.

itinerary.title: Istanbul to Bursa
itinerary.description: Travel to Bursa, visit the Green Mosque and Tomb, Ulu Cami.

itinerary.title: Bursa
itinerary.description: Explore Ottoman historical sites, silk market, and local cuisine.

itinerary.title: Bursa to Konya
itinerary.description: Travel to Konya, visit Mevlana Museum.

itinerary.title: Konya to Cappadocia
itinerary.description: Travel to Cappadocia, explore underground cities.

itinerary.title: Cappadocia
itinerary.description: Visit Goreme Open Air Museum, fairy chimneys, and valleys.

itinerary.title: Cappadocia
itinerary.description: Free time for optional hot air balloon ride, pottery workshops.

itinerary.title: Return to Istanbul
itinerary.description: Fly back to Istanbul, last-minute shopping, farewell dinner.
